alert.note: Alert for Calumet; Manitowoc (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Calumet and Manitowoc Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1214 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St Anna, or 16 miles northwest of Plymouth, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manitowoc, Chilton, Cleveland, Valders, St. Nazianz, St Anna, Camp Rokilio Scout Camp, Central Lake Winnebago, Two Rivers and Kiel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
